item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is: Wicked Wolf Tavern

Wicked Wolf Tavern is an Irish Tavern brought to you by the same ownership as Black Bear, in the location of the old Playwright of New Haven. It features some beautiful architectural woodwork. For more details: www.wickedwolfnh.com

Specials:
I (A.J.) recently won a $2 Happy Hour from them and have decided to share it with all of you!

For the first two hours, from 6-8 pm, there are A LOT of options for $2, including:
- All 16 Draft Beers
-Call Drinks
-House wine
-Soda and Juice

All you have to do is see me to get a wrist band.
*The $2 drinks do not include: Top Shelf Drinks, Bottled Beers, Shots, Monster, Martiniâ€™s, Tall Drinks, and Doubles.

After 8pm we'll be subject to whatever specials are on that night. (probably $3 bud and 50 cent wings.)

I'll be contact for this event (A.J.) and can be reached at 315-345-9348.

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.name: Happy Hour - Wicked Wolf! ($2 Drinks!)
